content.code:
https://github.com/PaddlePaddle/models/tree/develop/PaddleNLP/Research/EMNLP2019-GELE. “GELE” is the abbreviation for Global Encoder andLocal Encoder, i.e.,
Encoder1 and Encoder2 respectively
